sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import {MoreVert} from "@material-ui/icons" import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like); const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false); const likeHandler =()=>{ setLike(isLiked?like-1:like+1) setIsLiked(!isLiked) } const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; return (
u.id===post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id===post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} likes
{post.comment} comment
) }
